targets.query: select count("count") from (SELECT count(value) FROM "meter.hono.messaging.messages.processed.m1_rate" where time > now() - 11s group by host)
select sum(*) from ( select last(value) from "meter.hono.messaging.messages.processed.m1_rate" where tenant = '$TENANT' and type = 'telemetry' group by host ) where time > now() - 1d
select sum(*) from ( select last(value) from "meter.hono.messaging.messages.processed.m1_rate" where tenant = '$TENANT' and type = 'event' group by host ) where time > now() - 1d
SELECT mean(value) FROM "meter.hono.messaging.messages.processed.m1_rate" WHERE $timeFilter and type = 'telemetry' and  tenant = '$TENANT' GROUP BY host, time($__interval) fill(null)
